mapper.select: SELECT * FROM admin_notice WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} ORDER BY admin_notice_seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN_NOTICE (ADMIN_NOTICE_SEQ, ADMIN_NOTICE_TITLE, ADMIN_NOTICE_CONTENT, ADMIN_NOTICE_TIME, ADMIN_ID) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ADMIN_NOTICE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM ADMIN_NOTICE), #{adminNoticeTitle}, #{adminNoticeContent}, SYSDATE, #{adminId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_notice SET admin_notice_title = #{adminNoticeTitle}, admin_notice_content = #{adminNoticeContent}, WHERE admin_notice_seq = #{adminNoticeSeq}
